item.title: Create custom email address and attach with Gmail
item.description: Scenario I have a Gmail address (e.g.: free@gmail.com) I have a domain (e.g.: example.com) I want to make a custom email address with own domain (e.g.: hello@example.com) I want to receive all the emails sent to custom email address in my Gmail (e.g.: hello@example.com -> free@gmail.com) I want to send email from custom email address while sending emails from my Gmail (e.g.: select hello@example.com as sender from free@gmail.com) Solution Set up email forwarding The first step is to set up email forwarding in the domain management dashboard.
